author: Stacy Meichtry
title: Macron, Trump Face Off in Charm Contest
text:
WASHINGTON—It was a duel to see which president—Donald Trump or Emmanuel Macron of France—could shower the other with more public affection.
There was a flurry of hugs, hand-holding and an impromptu episode of president-on-president grooming that set the scene for a finale of air kisses.
Mr. Macron had come to Washington for the first state...
